member.name: P:Telerik.Universal.UI.Xaml.Controls.Chart.ChartAnnotationLabelDefinition.Location
member.summary: Gets or sets the value that defines the primary location of the annotation label visual.
member.remarks: Annotations provide a mechanism for label positioning that consists of three layers -- primary (Location), secondary (Horizontal/VerticalAlignment), and tertiary (Horizontal/VerticalOffset).

member.name: P:Telerik.Universal.UI.Xaml.Controls.Chart.ChartAnnotationLabelDefinition.HorizontalAlignment
member.summary: Gets or sets the horizontal alignment value that can be used as a secondary mechanism in conjunction with the primary Location property value.
member.remarks: Annotations provide a mechanism for label positioning that consists of three layers -- primary (Location), secondary (Horizontal/VerticalAlignment), and tertiary (Horizontal/VerticalOffset).
member.value: HorizontalAlignment property value is not applicable if Location property is set to either ChartAnnotationLabelLocation.Left, or ChartAnnotationLabelLocation.Right.

member.name: P:Telerik.Universal.UI.Xaml.Controls.Chart.ChartAnnotationLabelDefinition.VerticalAlignment
member.summary: Gets or sets the vertical alignment value that can be used in conjunction with the primary Location property value.
member.remarks: Annotations provide a mechanism for label positioning that consists of three layers -- primary (Location), secondary (Horizontal/VerticalAlignment), and tertiary (Horizontal/VerticalOffset).
member.value: VerticalAlignment property value is not applicable if Location property is set to either ChartAnnotationLabelLocation.Top, or ChartAnnotationLabelLocation.Bottom.

member.name: P:Telerik.Universal.UI.Xaml.Controls.Chart.ChartAnnotationLabelDefinition.HorizontalOffset
member.summary: Gets or sets the horizontal offset in pixels that can be specified besides the primary Location and the secondary HorizontalAlignment properties.
member.remarks: Annotations provide a mechanism for label positioning that consists of three layers -- primary (Location), secondary (Horizontal/VerticalAlignment), and tertiary (Horizontal/VerticalOffset).

member.name: P:Telerik.Universal.UI.Xaml.Controls.Chart.ChartAnnotationLabelDefinition.VerticalOffset
member.summary: Gets or sets the vertical offset in pixels that can be specified besides the primary Location and the secondary VerticalAlignment properties.
member.remarks: Annotations provide a mechanism for label positioning that consists of three layers -- primary (Location), secondary (Horizontal/VerticalAlignment), and tertiary (Horizontal/VerticalOffset).
